name: Nugget
description: Friendly and curious, loves to explore his surroundings in a secure play area.

name: Pearl
color: White with black and brown markings
description: Initially reserved but very intelligent and capable of complex behaviours.

name: Gizmo
description: Extremely active and loves running on his wheel, best for experienced owners.

name: Fudge
description: Sweet and easy-going, enjoys cuddling and gentle handling.

name: Sparkle
description: Quiet and observant, likes to watch her surroundings from her cage.
health: Monitored for slight weight issues, otherwise healthy.

name: Ziggy
description: PAdventurous and clever, skilled at navigating mazes and tunnels.
